Class And

  • java.lang.Object
    • Formula

  • public class And
extends Formula
    Implements the conjunction of two or more formulas

      • evaluate

        public boolean evaluate(KripkeModel model,
                        int state)
        Evaluate a conjunction in a `state` using the given `model`
        Specified by:
        evaluate in class Formula
        Parameters:
        model - The model used for evaluation
        state - The state to evaluate the conjunction in
        Returns:
        `true` if all the conjuncts hold in state `state`, `false` otherwise

      • negate

        public Formula negate()
        Negates a conjunction. Returns a version that is faster to evaluate than using `Neg` if the conjunction is true
        Overrides:
        negate in class Formula
        Returns:
        Fast evaluating negation

      • memoize

        public Formula memoize()
        Description copied from class: Formula
        Make a formula remember its evaluation in a specific state. Do not use if you work with different models
        Overrides:
        memoize in class Formula
        Returns:
        The memoized version of the formula
